ValidationRule.description: Once a date is entered into the Settlement Accepted Date field, it cannot be edited after.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( RecordType.Name = 'Commercial Claim', RecordType.Name = 'Residential Claim' ), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", ISCHANGED( Settlement_Acceptance_Date__c), NOT ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE( Settlement_Acceptance_Date__c))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The value in Settlement Accepted Date field cannot be changed.
